text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said it cut earnings estimates for Arbor Software Corp based on its belief Arbor is spending more than expected to boost its sales force in Europe and North America.

-- Hambrecht cut its fiscal 1998 (ending March 31) estimate to $0.72 a share from $0.82. The revenue forecast remained unchanged at $80 million. Fiscal 1997 full year and fourth quarter estimates were unchanged at $0.50/shr and $0.15/shr, respectively.
-- The investment firm cut its calendar 1997 estimate to $0.63/shr from $0.70, and calendar 1998 to $1.09 from $1.14. -- Its buy recommendation was maintained
-- Arbor shares were off 1-1/4 at 19 in late morning.
